name: International Conference on Inventive Computing and Applications
content: The main idea of the International Conference on Inventive Computing and Applications \[ICICA 2019\] is to bring together researchers, academicians, industrialists and engineers together from all over the world to present and discuss about the on-going research activities to strengthen the interactions between researchers and industrialists. The conference provides significant opportunities for the delegates to present their innovative research ideas, experiences and applications in the field of computing intelligence to enable the future collaboration of next generation technologies. The theme of the conference broadly focuses on leveraging the emerging smart computing technologies and knowledge transfer approaches and optimization solutions for the evolving fields of science and technology.
